title: Vanished
description: In this Dateline classic, Sandi Johnson, a devoted mother, mysteriously vanishes the day before her son’s 5th birthday party. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on May 9, 2014.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
